00039         bool CPluginDefVisitor::VisitEnter(const TiXmlElement &element, const TiXmlAttribute *firstAttribute)
00040         {
00041                 if(element.ValueStr() == _plugin)
00042                         return ProcessPluginDef(element, firstAttribute);
00043                 else if (element.ValueStr() == _prereq)
00044                         return ProcessPrerequisites(element, firstAttribute);
00045                 else if (element.ValueStr() == _exports)
00046                         return ProcessExports(element, firstAttribute);
00047                 else if (element.ValueStr() == _provides)
00048                         return ProcessProvides(element, firstAttribute);
00049                 else if (element.ValueStr() == _extends)
00050                         return ProcessExtends(element, firstAttribute);
00051 
00052                 return false;
00053         }
00054

00056         {
00057                 return true;
00058         }

00080         /*=======================================================================
00081          =  Parsing functions
00082          ==============*
00083 * Copyrights (c) Sergey Mikhtonyuk 2007-2010.
00084 * Terms of use, copying, distribution, and modification
00085 * are covered in accompanying LICENSE file
00086 =========================================================*/
00087         bool CPluginDefVisitor::ProcessPluginDef(const TiXmlElement &element, const TiXmlAttribute *firstAttribute)
00088         {
00089                 Version = -1;
00090 
00091                 const TiXmlAttribute* pAttr = firstAttribute;
00092                 while(pAttr)
00093                 {
00094                         if(pAttr->NameStr() == _name) // Read plugin name
00095                                 PluginName = pAttr->ValueStr();
00096                         else if (pAttr->NameStr() == _version) // Read version
00097                                 if(pAttr->QueryIntValue(&Version) != TIXML_SUCCESS)
00098                                         ThrowHelper(_invalid_format);
00099 
00100                         pAttr = pAttr->Next();
00101                 }
00102 
00103                 // Validate all params are set
00104                 if(PluginName.size() == 0 || Version == -1)
00105                         ThrowHelper(_not_enough_params);
00106 
00107                 ToLower(PluginName);
00108 
00109                 return true;
00110         }
00111

00113 
00114         bool CPluginDefVisitor::ProcessPrerequisites(const TiXmlElement &element, const TiXmlAttribute *firstAttribute)
00115         {
00116                 const TiXmlElement *pReq = element.FirstChildElement();
00117                 while(pReq)
00118                 {
00119                         PrerequisiteDef* definition = new PrerequisiteDef;
00120                         Prerequisites.push_back(definition);
00121 
00122                         const TiXmlAttribute *pAttr = pReq->FirstAttribute();
00123 
00124                         while(pAttr)
00125                         {
00126                                 if(pAttr->NameStr() == _plugin)
00127                                 {
00128                                         definition->Plugin = pAttr->ValueStr();
00129                                         ToLower(definition->Plugin);
00130                                 }
00131                                 pAttr = pAttr->Next();
00132                         }
00133 
00134                         if(definition->Plugin.size() == 0)
00135                                 ThrowHelper(_invalid_format); // No need to delete, pointer is protected by adding to collection first
00136 
00137                         pReq = pReq->NextSiblingElement();
00138                 }
00139                 return false;
00140         }
00141

00143 
00144         bool CPluginDefVisitor::ProcessExports(const TiXmlElement &element, const TiXmlAttribute *firstAttribute)
00145         {
00146                 const TiXmlElement *pReq = element.FirstChildElement();
00147                 while(pReq)
00148                 {
00149                         const TiXmlAttribute *pAttr = pReq->FirstAttribute();
00150                         ExportDef* definition = new ExportDef;
00151                         Exports.push_back(definition);
00152 
00153                         while(pAttr)
00154                         {
00155                                 if(pAttr->NameStr() == _name)
00156                                 {
00157                                         definition->ClassName = pAttr->ValueStr();
00158                                 }
00159                                 else if(pAttr->NameStr() == _classid)
00160                                 {
00161                                         definition->ClassID = pAttr->ValueStr();
00162                                 }
00163 
00164                                 pAttr = pAttr->Next();
00165                         }
00166 
00167                         if(definition->ClassID.size() == 0 ||
00168                                 !definition->ClassGUID.parse(definition->ClassID.c_str()))
00169                                 ThrowHelper("Invalid guid format, parsing failed");
00170 
00171                         pReq = pReq->NextSiblingElement();
00172                 }
00173                 return false;
00174         }
00175 
00176 
00177         bool CPluginDefVisitor::ProcessProvides(const TiXmlElement &element, const TiXmlAttribute *firstAttribute)
00178         {
00179                 ExtensionPointDef* definition = new ExtensionPointDef;
00180                 ExtensionPoints.push_back(definition);
00181                 std::string siid;
00182 
00183                 while(firstAttribute)
00184                 {
00185                         if(firstAttribute->NameStr() == _point)
00186                         {
00187                                 definition->PointID = firstAttribute->ValueStr();
00188                                 ToLower(definition->PointID);
00189                         }
00190                         else if(firstAttribute->NameStr() == _iid)
00191                         {
00192                                 siid = firstAttribute->ValueStr();
00193                         }
00194 
00195                         firstAttribute = firstAttribute->Next();
00196                 }
00197 
00198                 if(definition->PointID.size() == 0 ||
00199                         !definition->InterfaceID.parse(siid.c_str()))
00200                         ThrowHelper("Invalid guid format, parsing failed");
00201 
00202                 return false;
00203         }

00206 
00207         bool CPluginDefVisitor::ProcessExtends(const TiXmlElement& element, const TiXmlAttribute* firstAttribute)
00208         {
00209                 ExtensionDef* definition = new ExtensionDef;
00210                 Extensions.push_back(definition);
00211                 std::string classid;
00212 
00213                 // Load point's name
00214                 while(firstAttribute)
00215                 {
00216                         if(firstAttribute->NameStr() == _point)
00217                         {
00218                                 definition->PointID = firstAttribute->ValueStr();
00219                                 ToLower(definition->PointID);
00220                         }
00221                         else if(firstAttribute->NameStr() == _classid)
00222                         {
00223                                 classid = firstAttribute->ValueStr();
00224                         }
00225 
00226                         firstAttribute = firstAttribute->Next();
00227                 }
00228 
00229                 // Validate point
00230                 if(definition->PointID.size() == 0)
00231                         ThrowHelper(_not_enough_params);
00232 
00233                 if(definition->PointID[0] == ':' || definition->PointID[definition->PointID.size() - 1] == ':')
00234                         ThrowHelper(_invalid_format);
00235 
00236                 // Translate classid to class guid
00237                 if(classid.size() != 0)
00238                 {
00239                         TExports::const_iterator it = std::find_if(Exports.begin(), Exports.end(),
00240                                 boost::bind(&ExportDef::ClassName, _1) == classid);
00241 
00242                         if(it != Exports.end())
00243                                 definition->ClassID = (*it)->ClassGUID;
00244                         else if(!definition->ClassID.parse(classid.c_str()))
00245                                 ThrowHelper(_invalid_format);
00246                 }
00247                 else
00248                 {
00249                         definition->ClassID.reset();
00250                 }
00251 
00252                 // Fill the property map
00253 
00254                 const TiXmlElement* pElems = element.FirstChildElement();
00255                 while(pElems)
00256                 {
00257                         if(!pElems->FirstChild())
00258                                 ThrowHelper(_invalid_format);
00259 
00260                         const std::string& name = pElems->ValueStr();
00261                         const std::string* pvalue = &pElems->FirstChild()->ValueStr();
00262 
00263                         // Convert all class names in property values to class'es GUIDs
00264                         TExports::const_iterator it = std::find_if(Exports.begin(), Exports.end(),
00265                                 boost::bind(&ExportDef::ClassName, _1) == *pvalue);
00266 
00267                         if(it != Exports.end())
00268                                 pvalue = &(*it)->ClassID;
00269 
00270                         definition->PropertyMap.insert(std::make_pair(name, *pvalue));
00271                         pElems = pElems->NextSiblingElement();
00272                 }
00273 
00274                 return false;
00275         }

00277 
00278         void CPluginDefVisitor::ThrowHelper(const char* message)
00279         {
00280                 throw module::RuntimeException(message);
00281         }
00282 
00283         CPluginDefVisitor::~CPluginDefVisitor()
00284         {
00285                 for(size_t i = 0; i < Exports.size(); ++i)
00286                         if(Exports[i]) delete Exports[i];
00287                 for(size_t i = 0; i < Extensions.size(); ++i)
00288                         if(Extensions[i]) delete Extensions[i];
00289                 for(size_t i = 0; i < Prerequisites.size(); ++i)
00290                         if(Prerequisites[i]) delete Prerequisites[i];
00291                 for(size_t i = 0; i < ExtensionPoints.size(); ++i)
00292                         if(ExtensionPoints[i]) delete ExtensionPoints[i];
00293         }
00294 
00295         void CPluginDefVisitor::ToLower(std::string &str)
00296         {
00297                 std::transform(str.begin(), str.end(), str.begin(), tolower);
00298         }
